org.sakaiproject.calendar.impl

Class DbCalendarService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.calendar.impl.BaseCalendarService
      • org.sakaiproject.calendar.impl.DbCalendarService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CalendarService, ContextObserver, EntityProducer, EntityTransferrer, EntityTransferrerRefMigrator, CacheRefresher, SAXEntityReader, StorageUser

    public class DbCalendarService
extends BaseCalendarService

    DbCalendarService fills out the BaseCalendarService with a database implementation.

    The sql scripts in src/sql/chef_calendar.sql must be run on the database.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  DbCalendarService.DbStorage
      Covers for the BaseDbStorage, providing Chat parameters Note: base class containers are reference based, this service is still id based - converted here %%%
